Q_DESC:
Write a C program to find out the subsets of a word. For example, some of the subsets of the word programming is,p,r, o, g, r, a , m, m ,i, n, g, pr, po, pg, pr, pm, rammin, etc.

Input Format:
1. Enter the length of the string
2. Enter the string
